General.Name: LandOcean Energy Services Co
General.Description: LandOcean Energy Services Co.,Ltd. research, develops, commercializes, and sells petroleum exploration and development software, oil and gas equipment, downhole equipment, and instrument technology in China and internationally. It engages in the geological and geophysical, engineering technology, and computer science and applied mathematics businesses. The company also provides technical services. It serves oil and gas industry. LandOcean Energy Services Co.,Ltd. is headquartered in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Ms. Xuexia  Yu
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Accounting Supervisor & Director
